name: 葉奕良
objective: 針對線性與非線性系統，簡介及分析常用控制器理論與設計方法，包含pole placement、linearization、discretization、gain scheduling、H-infinity control、optimal control、sliding-mode control、robust observer
schedule:
第一週 預備週
第二週 Equilibrium points and linearization
第三週 Linear control review
第四週 Discretization and Z-transform
第五週 Stability and frequency response for discrete system
第六週 Control design for discrete system I
第七週 Control design for discrete system II
第八週 Gain-scheduling control
第九週 期中考
第十週 H-infinity control I
第十一週 H-infinity control II
第十二週 Lyapunov stability
第十三週 Optimal control
第十四週 Sliding-mode control I
第十五週 Sliding-mode control II
第十六週 Robust Observer I
第十七週 Robust Observer II
第十八週 期末考
scorePolicy:
作業   40%
期中考 30%
期末考 30%
materials:
使用教材：自編課程講義

參考書目：

[1] C. T. Chen, “Linear system theory and design“, Oxford.
[2] K. Ogata, “Discrete-Time Control Systems”, Prentice-Hall.
[3] H. K. Khalil, “Nonlinear systems”, Prentice Hall.
[4] J. C. Doyle, B. A. Francis, and A. R. Tannenbaum, “Feedback control theory”, Courier Corporation,
[5] K. Zhou, and J. C. Doyle, “Essentials of robust control”, Prentice Hall.
[6] A. Isidori, “Nonlinear control systems”, Springer.
[7] F.L. Lewis and V.L. Syrmos, “Optimal Control” John Wiley & Sons.
